synthesis_conditions.drying_method: dried in vacuo for 30 min at room temperature
synthesis_conditions.yield: Insufficient material was available for combustion analysis to determine elemental percentage

synthesis_conditions.notes: The synthesis conditions for this material are not explicitly provided in the text. However, it is mentioned that it is isostructural to the corresponding Fe compound and has broader nCN absorptions at 2225 and 2173 cm(cid:3)1.

additional_notes: The paper also discusses the magnetic properties and structural analysis of the materials, but these details are excluded from this synthesis conditions summary as per the instructions.
